BREAST-COMPOSITION: This mammogram image shows a heterogeneously dense breast composition (ACR C), indicating a significant amount of glandular tissue that can make it more challenging to detect abnormalities.
FINDINGS: No clear masses or calcifications are visible in this image. However, there is some architectural distortion noted in the upper outer quadrant of the right breast (BI-RADS 3, requiring short-term follow-up to confirm stability).
